- Himitsu is a fork of Dantotsu. Dantotsu, by itself, provides an anime and manga tracker and does not provide any anime or manga streaming or downloading content. 

 - Himitsu and any Himitsu contributors do not host any of the content found inside Himitsu. Any and all images or information found in the app are taken from various public APIs (AniList, MyAnimeList, Kitsu). 

 - Furthermore, all of the anime/manga links found in Himitsu are provided by various 3rd party plugins supplied by the user and have no affiliation with Himitsu or its staff. 

 - Himitsu and it's contributors aren't liable for any misuse of any of the contents found inside or outside of the app and cannot be held accountable for the distribution of any of the contents found inside the app. 

 - By using Himitsu, you confirm that the developer of Himitsu is not responsible for any of the contents found in the app or Dantotsu. You also agree to not use Himitsu to download or stream any copyrighted content. 

 - If any internet infringement issues are involved, please contact the Dantotsu website. Himitsu and its contributors do not assume any legal responsibility.

Himitsu is an Anilist Based App, so for syncing with your MAL Account, It needs an Anilist account to be logged in. 
Once logged in with both Anilist and MAL accounts, the app will automatically update your MAL account whenever: 
- Add a new Media 
- Edit a Media 
- Delete a Media


Note: The app will not sync old Media's from Anilist to MAL, It's recommended to sync them. 
- Check __FAQs__ for _Easy Method_


And for _Intermediates_ : 
- [How to sync Anilist data with MAL](https://anilist.co/forum/thread/2654) 
- [How to sync MAL data with Anilist](https://anilist.co/forum/thread/3393)


_It is not required to sync both MAL and Anilist accounts._

Dantotsu merged components of Aniyomi into the core code of Saikou, but then Himitsu forked Dantotsu and began improving upon it. It is (mostly) an Anilist only client, which also supports extensions. \n>Himitsu (秘密; Him-itsu) means \"secret\" in Japanese. Shhh. It\'s a secret so good that even the name is banned.
What are some features of Himitsu?

This would be a pretty big paragraph if we listed everything Dantotsu attempts to accomplish, let alone everything Himitsu has added onto that. Your best bet would be to drop by the [Himitsu GitHub](https://github.com/RepoDevil/Himitsu) and look over the README.
Mitä eroa Stable, Beta & Alpha versiot?

This fork does not provide multiple tracks. The version you download from the [repository](https://github.com/RepoDevil/Himitsu) is the same one [AbandonedCart](https://github.com/AbandonedCart) is running. If you find bugs and have already updated to the latest version, feel free to submit an [issue](https://github.com/RepoDevil/Himitsu/issues)

Currently no (for both Windows and Linux). There isn\'t any estimation when it will be available. But you can download any Android emulator and run Himitsu on it. For Windows 11 users, they can use the Windows Subsystem for Android (WSA) to run Himitsu in Windows.
No, best we can do is carve Himitsu on an apple.
The short answer is no, but a detailed explanation is available in the [Himitsu README](https://github.com/RepoDevil/Himitsu?tab=readme-ov-file#himitsu-%EF%B8%8F)

Tämä johtuu siitä, että se päivittyy 48 tunnin välein (Anilist). Jos haluat päivittää tilastojasi, voit pakottaa tilastojesi päivityksen sen jälkeen, kun olet mennyt tähän [link](https://anilist.co/settings/lists).

A third-party download Add-on is developed and distributed by Dantotsu. Compatibility is based on Dantotsu and may cease to function at any time. It can be found by accessing the \"Add-ons\" page in the app settings.

Voit ottaa NSFW-sisällön käyttöön ottamalla käyttöön 18 + sisällön tästä [link](https://anilist.co/settings/media). Sinun on myös otettava käyttöön NSFW-laajennukset \`Settings > Extensions > NSFW extensions\`
How to import my MAL / Kitsu lists to Anilist?

Tässä on miten teet sen,

vienti:

1. Mene tähän [link](https://malscraper. zurewebsites.net).
2. Anna Kitsu/MAL käyttäjänimi ja lataa sekä anime että manga lista. (Ne ovat XML-muodossa)
Huomautus: Sinun täytyy kirjoittaa valitsemasi seurantaohjelman käyttäjänimi

Tuo:

1. Kun olet vienyt anime- ja manga-listasi Kitsu/MAL:ista, siirry nyt [here](https://anilist.co/settings/import) 
2. Valitse / pudota anime XML tiedosto laatikkoon edellä.
→Valinta / pudota manga XML tiedosto alla olevaan ruutuun.
How to import my Anilist / Kitsu lists to MAL?

Tässä on miten teet sen,

vienti:

1. Mene tähän [link](https://malscraper. zurewebsites.net/). 
2. Anna Anilist käyttäjänimesi/Kitsu tunnus 'Käyttäjänimi/Kitsu Käyttäjätunniste' -laatikossa. 
3. Valitse listan tyyppi ja ota käyttöön 'update_on_import'. 
4. Lataa tiedosto; se on .xml-muodossa. Muista ladata sekä Anime että Manga listat.

Tuo:
1. Voit tuoda sen MAL tililläsi, mene tähän [link](https://myanimelist. et/import.php) ja valitse 'MyAnimeList Tuonti' tuontityypiksi. 
2. Paina 'Valitse tiedosto 'Valitse tiedosto 'ja valitse ladatut anime/manga lista XML-tiedosto. 
3. Paina 'Tuo tietoja'. 
Onnittelut, olet juuri tuonut valitun listan MAL tilillesi.
Why can\'t I find a specific anime / manga title?

Let's say you are looking for Castlevania, but Anilist doesn't have it. This means Himitsu doesn't, either.
A solution to this problem is as follows:
1) Go to any anime that's not in your list.
2) Go to the watch section.
3) Select any source and press on the 'Wrong Title?'.
4) Now search for Castlevania (The anime you were looking for) and select it.
5) ENJOY!

If you can't find the anime through these steps, then that's bad luck for you, bud. Try a different source.
Miten korjata lähteet, jotka valitsevat täysin väärän nimen?

Himitsu itself doesn\'t host anything but relies on other sources. When showing the episodes, it chooses the 1st result given by the source after searching for the title. Himitsu has no way of detecting if that\'s legit or not. So, for this, we have the \'Wrong Title?\' just below the source name(above layouts). You can choose the correct result/title by pressing on it and enjoy its episodes.

Sorry to break it to you, but only a small amount of manga have coloured version. If a coloured version is supposed to be available, it may simply be hidden in Himitsu. Let's say you want to read the coloured version of Chainsaw Man. Follow the steps below ↓

1) Go to Chainsaw Man
2) Press on 'Read'
3) Select any working source
4) Press 'Wrong Title'
5) Select the colored Chainsaw Man
6) Enjoy

Note: Many sources don't have the coloured version even if it's available somewhere else. Try a different source. If none of the sources have it, then a coloured version of your desired manga may not exist.
Kädenpuristus epäonnistui? Miksi aikaleimia ei ladata?

You can fix this issue by enabling \'Proxy\' from \n\`Settings > Anime > Player Settings > Segments > Proxy\`.\nIf the timestamps are still not loading but the handshake failed popup is fixed, then the episode you are watching just doesn\'t have timestamps yet for it.

Joitakin peruskorjauksia olisivat : 

• Päivitä laajennukset, jos niitä on. 
• Avaa Web View ja odota latausta. Lataamisen jälkeen mene takaisin. (Jos Web View näyttää virheen 404 tai jotain vastaavaa, Mahdollisuudet ovat, että lähde on alhaalla)
• Käytä eri DNS asetuksista, mieluiten Libre. 
• Kokeile luotettava VPN. (Tämän jälkeen on toistettava vaihe 1) 

Jos mikään yllä olevista vaiheista ei toimi, käytä toista lähdettä tai liity [discord](https://discord. g/invite/4HPZ5nAWwM) avun saamiseksi.

The following presents some tips and tricks you may or may not know about - 
 
 
 - By hold pressing the Himitsu logo in settings, you can check if there are any new updates manually. 
 
 - Hold pressing an error message/tag/synonym or title will copy it. 
 
 - You can open an episode with other apps by hold pressing any server for that episode. This helps in streaming the episode using other video players or download the episode using download managers. 
 
 - You can set up custom lists using this [link](https://anilist.co/settings/lists). (you need to be signed in) 
 
 - If your episode/chapter is not being progressed automatically after you finish watching/reading it, then hold press the status bar(planning/repeating/watching button) of that anime/manga. The next time you start a chapter/finish an episode, you will stumble upon a popup. Press yes there.

By logging in, your discord will now show what you are watching & reading on Himitsu
